findings.title: Contracts have withdrawal fee
findings.description: The contracts have a withdrawal fee mechanism.

findings.title: _rebalance function is internal and unused
findings.description: The _rebalance function is declared as internal but it's not being used anywhere in the contract.

findings.title: Owner can change apr address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the APR address.

findings.title: Owner can change fee amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the fee amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change fee address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the fee address.

findings.title: EarnAPRWithPool Owner Privilege: Adding Token Addresses
findings.description: The EarnAPRWithPool owner has the privilege to add fulcrum, aave, xTokens, and fortube token addresses.

findings.title: APRWithPoolOracle can change AAVE address
findings.description: The APRWithPoolOracle contract has the privilege to modify the AAVE address, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: APRWithPoolOracle can change liquidationRatio
findings.description: The APRWithPoolOracle contract has the ability to modify the liquidation ratio, which could lead to unintended consequences.
